pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. the plant sprouts and grows with this pokémon.

pokemons.name: Ivysaur
pokemons.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemons.name: Venusaur
pokemons.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. it stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: Obviously prefers hot places. when it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemons.name: Charmeleon
pokemons.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

pokemons.name: Charizard
pokemons.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pokemons.name: Wartortle
pokemons.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. for swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

pokemons.name: Blastoise
pokemons.description: A brutal pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. they are used for high speed tackles.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokemons.name: Metapod
pokemons.description: This pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

pokemons.name: Butterfree
pokemons.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemons.name: Weedle
pokemons.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. it has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

pokemons.name: Kakuna
pokemons.description: Almost incapable of moving, this pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

pokemons.name: Beedrill
pokemons.description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. they are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

pokemons.name: Pidgey
pokemons.description: A common sight in forests and woods. it flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

pokemons.name: Pidgeotto
pokemons.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

pokemons.name: Pidgeot
pokemons.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as magikarp.

pokemons.name: Rattata
pokemons.description: Bites anything when it attacks. small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

pokemons.name: Raticate
pokemons.description: It uses its whis­ kers to maintain its balance. it apparently slows down if they are cut off.

pokemons.name: Spearow
pokemons.description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

pokemons.name: Fearow
pokemons.description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

pokemons.name: Ekans
pokemons.description: Moves silently and stealthily. eats the eggs of birds, such as pidgey and spearow, whole.

pokemons.name: Arbok
pokemons.description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: When several of these pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

pokemons.name: Raichu
pokemons.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

pokemons.name: Sandshrew
pokemons.description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. it only emerges to hunt for food.

pokemons.name: Sandslash
pokemons.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. it can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

pokemons.name: Nidoran-f
pokemons.description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this pokémon dangerous. the female has smaller horns.

pokemons.name: Nidorina
pokemons.description: The female's horn develops slowly. prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

pokemons.name: Nidoqueen
pokemons.description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. it uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

pokemons.name: Nidoran-m
pokemons.description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. the larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

pokemons.name: Nidorino
pokemons.description: An aggressive pokémon that is quick to attack. the horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

pokemons.name: Nidoking
pokemons.description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

pokemons.name: Clefairy
pokemons.description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. it is rare and found only in certain areas.

pokemons.name: Clefable
pokemons.description: A timid fairy pokémon that is rarely seen. it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

pokemons.name: Vulpix
pokemons.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. the tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

pokemons.name: Ninetales
pokemons.description: Very smart and very vengeful. grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

pokemons.name: Jigglypuff
pokemons.description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

pokemons.name: Wigglytuff
pokemons.description: The body is soft and rubbery. when angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

pokemons.name: Zubat
pokemons.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokemons.name: Golbat
pokemons.description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

pokemons.name: Oddish
pokemons.description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. at night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

pokemons.name: Gloom
pokemons.description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. it is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

pokemons.name: Vileplume
pokemons.description: It has the world’s largest petals. with every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

pokemons.name: Paras
pokemons.description: Burrows to suck tree roots. the mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

pokemons.name: Parasect
pokemons.description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. prefers damp places.

pokemons.name: Venonat
pokemons.description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. it is attracted by light at night.

pokemons.name: Venomoth
pokemons.description: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

pokemons.name: Diglett
pokemons.description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. it sometimes appears above ground.

pokemons.name: Dugtrio
pokemons.description: A team of diglett triplets. it triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

pokemons.name: Meowth
pokemons.description: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. it doesn’t get along with galarian meowth.

pokemons.name: Persian
pokemons.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokemons.name: Psyduck
pokemons.description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

pokemons.name: Golduck
pokemons.description: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. it is often mistaken for the japanese monster, kappa.

pokemons.name: Mankey
pokemons.description: Extremely quick to anger. it could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

pokemons.name: Primeape
pokemons.description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. it will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokemons.name: Growlithe
pokemons.description: Very protective of its territory. it will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pokemons.name: Arcanine
pokemons.description: A pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty. it runs agilely as if on wings.

pokemons.name: Poliwag
pokemons.description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. it appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokemons.name: Poliwhirl
pokemons.description: Capable of living in or out of water. when out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

pokemons.name: Poliwrath
pokemons.description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

pokemons.name: Abra
pokemons.description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

pokemons.name: Kadabra
pokemons.description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

pokemons.name: Alakazam
pokemons.description: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

pokemons.name: Machop
pokemons.description: Loves to build its muscles. it trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokemons.name: Machoke
pokemons.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

pokemons.name: Machamp
pokemons.description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

pokemons.name: Bellsprout
pokemons.description: A carnivorous pokémon that traps and eats bugs. it uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

pokemons.name: Weepinbell
pokemons.description: It spits out poisonpowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of acid.

pokemons.name: Victreebel
pokemons.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemons.name: Tentacool
pokemons.description: Drifts in shallow seas. anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

pokemons.name: Tentacruel
pokemons.description: The tentacles are normally kept short. on hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

pokemons.name: Geodude
pokemons.description: Found in fields and mountains. mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

pokemons.name: Graveler
pokemons.description: Rolls down slopes to move. it rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

pokemons.name: Golem
pokemons.description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. it can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

pokemons.name: Ponyta
pokemons.description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. it can trample anything completely flat in little time.

pokemons.name: Rapidash
pokemons.description: Very competitive, this pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemons.name: Slowpoke
pokemons.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. it takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

pokemons.name: Slowbro
pokemons.description: The shellder that is latched onto slowpoke's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

pokemons.name: Magnemite
pokemons.description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. appears without warning and uses thunder wave and similar moves.

pokemons.name: Magneton
pokemons.description: Formed by several magnemites linked together. they frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

pokemons.name: Farfetchd
pokemons.description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. it is used much like a metal sword.

pokemons.name: Doduo
pokemons.description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. leaves giant footprints.

pokemons.name: Dodrio
pokemons.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. while two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

pokemons.name: Seel
pokemons.description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. it is used for bashing through thick ice.

pokemons.name: Dewgong
pokemons.description: Stores thermal energy in its body. swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

pokemons.name: Grimer
pokemons.description: Appears in filthy areas. thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

pokemons.name: Muk
pokemons.description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. it is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

pokemons.name: Shellder
pokemons.description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. it is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

pokemons.name: Cloyster
pokemons.description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. its innards have never been seen.

pokemons.name: Gastly
pokemons.description: Almost invisible, this gaseous pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

pokemons.name: Haunter
pokemons.description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

pokemons.name: Gengar
pokemons.description: Under a full moon, this pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

pokemons.name: Onix
pokemons.description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

pokemons.name: Drowzee
pokemons.description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

pokemons.name: Hypno
pokemons.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of psi moves such as hypnosis and confusion.

pokemons.name: Krabby
pokemons.description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

pokemons.name: Kingler
pokemons.description: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. however, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

pokemons.name: Voltorb
pokemons.description: Usually found in power plants. easily mistaken for a poké ball, they have zapped many people.

pokemons.name: Electrode
pokemons.description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. it often explodes with little or no provocation.

pokemons.name: Exeggcute
pokemons.description: Often mistaken for eggs. when disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

pokemons.name: Exeggutor
pokemons.description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an exeggcute.

pokemons.name: Cubone
pokemons.description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this pokémon's real face.

pokemons.name: Marowak
pokemons.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. it throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to ko targets.

pokemons.name: Hitmonlee
pokemons.description: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. it runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

pokemons.name: Hitmonchan
pokemons.description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

pokemons.name: Lickitung
pokemons.description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. it leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

pokemons.name: Koffing
pokemons.description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

pokemons.name: Weezing
pokemons.description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 koffings can fuse into a weezing over many years.

pokemons.name: Rhyhorn
pokemons.description: A pokémon with a one-track mind. once it charges,  it won't stop running until it falls asleep.

pokemons.name: Rhydon
pokemons.description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

pokemons.name: Chansey
pokemons.description: A rare and elusive pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

pokemons.name: Tangela
pokemons.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. its vines shake as it walks.

pokemons.name: Kangaskhan
pokemons.description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

pokemons.name: Horsea
pokemons.description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

pokemons.name: Seadra
pokemons.description: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

pokemons.name: Goldeen
pokemons.description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the water queen.

pokemons.name: Seaking
pokemons.description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

pokemons.name: Staryu
pokemons.description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. the core flashes at midnight.

pokemons.name: Starmie
pokemons.description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. some people value the core as a gem.

pokemons.name: Mr-mime
pokemons.description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

pokemons.name: Scyther
pokemons.description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

pokemons.name: Jynx
pokemons.description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. it can cause people to dance in unison with it.

pokemons.name: Electabuzz
pokemons.description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

pokemons.name: Magmar
pokemons.description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

pokemons.name: Pinsir
pokemons.description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

pokemons.name: Tauros
pokemons.description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

pokemons.name: Magikarp
pokemons.description: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

pokemons.name: Gyarados
pokemons.description: Once it begins to rampage, a gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

pokemons.name: Lapras
pokemons.description: A pokémon that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. it can ferry people across the water.

pokemons.name: Ditto
pokemons.description: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

pokemons.name: Eevee
pokemons.description: Its genetic code is irregular. it may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element stones.

pokemons.name: Vaporeon
pokemons.description: Lives close to water. its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemons.name: Jolteon
pokemons.description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

pokemons.name: Flareon
pokemons.description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

pokemons.name: Porygon
pokemons.description: A pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

pokemons.name: Omanyte
pokemons.description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

pokemons.name: Omastar
pokemons.description: A prehistoric pokémon that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

pokemons.name: Kabuto
pokemons.description: A pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

pokemons.name: Kabutops
pokemons.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. it slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

pokemons.name: Aerodactyl
pokemons.description: A pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. its teeth are like saw blades.

pokemons.name: Snorlax
pokemons.description: Very lazy. just eats and sleeps. as its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

pokemons.name: Articuno
pokemons.description: A legendary bird pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

pokemons.name: Zapdos
pokemons.description: A legendary bird pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

pokemons.name: Moltres
pokemons.description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

pokemons.name: Dratini
pokemons.description: Long considered a mythical pokémon until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

pokemons.name: Dragonair
pokemons.description: A mystical pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. has the ability to change climate conditions.

pokemons.name: Dragonite
pokemons.description: An extremely rarely seen marine pokémon. its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

pokemons.name: Mewtwo
pokemons.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and dna engineering experiments.

pokemons.name: Mew
pokemons.description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. only a few people have seen it worldwide.

pokemons.name: Chikorita
pokemons.description: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. it is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.

pokemons.name: Bayleef
pokemons.description: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.

pokemons.name: Meganium
pokemons.description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

pokemons.name: Cyndaquil
pokemons.description: It has a timid nature. if it is startled, the flames on its back burn more vigorously.

pokemons.name: Quilava
pokemons.description: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. it means that it will attack with the fire on its back.

pokemons.name: Typhlosion
pokemons.description: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

pokemons.name: Totodile
pokemons.description: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. even its trainer must be careful.

pokemons.name: Croconaw
pokemons.description: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. there are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

pokemons.name: Feraligatr
pokemons.description: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

pokemons.name: Sentret
pokemons.description: A very cautious pokémon, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

pokemons.name: Furret
pokemons.description: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. the nest is impossible for other pokémon to enter.

pokemons.name: Hoothoot
pokemons.description: It always stands on one foot. it changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

pokemons.name: Noctowl
pokemons.description: Its eyes are specially adapted. they concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

pokemons.name: Ledyba
pokemons.description: It is very timid. it will be afraid to move if it is alone. but it will be active if it is in a group.

pokemons.name: Ledian
pokemons.description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

pokemons.name: Spinarak
pokemons.description: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

pokemons.name: Ariados
pokemons.description: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. it is hard to tell which end is which.

pokemons.name: Crobat
pokemons.description: It flies so si­ lently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

pokemons.name: Chinchou
pokemons.description: Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one another to claim their respective turf.

pokemons.name: Lanturn
pokemons.description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

pokemons.name: Pichu
pokemons.description: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. it may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

pokemons.name: Cleffa
pokemons.description: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

pokemons.name: Igglybuff
pokemons.description: It has a very soft body. if it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

pokemons.name: Togepi
pokemons.description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. it is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

pokemons.name: Togetic
pokemons.description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, car­ ing people and shower them with happiness.

pokemons.name: Natu
pokemons.description: Because its wings aren't yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. it is always star­ ing at something.

pokemons.name: Xatu
pokemons.description: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

pokemons.name: Mareep
pokemons.description: If static elec­ tricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. touching it will shock you.

pokemons.name: Flaaffy
pokemons.description: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.

pokemons.name: Ampharos
pokemons.description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. it acts as a beacon for lost people.

pokemons.name: Bellossom
pokemons.description: Plentiful in the tropics. when it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

pokemons.name: Marill
pokemons.description: The tip of its tail, which con­ tains oil that is lighter than wa­ ter, lets it swim without drowning.

pokemons.name: Azumarill
pokemons.description: It lives in water virtually all day long. its body color and pattern act as camouflage that makes it tough for enemies to spot in water.

pokemons.name: Sudowoodo
pokemons.description: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composi­ tion appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.

pokemons.name: Politoed
pokemons.description: If poliwag and poliwhirl hear its echoing cry, they respond by gather­ ing from far and wide.

pokemons.name: Hoppip
pokemons.description: To keep from being blown away by the wind, they gather in clusters. they do enjoy gentle breezes, though.

pokemons.name: Skiploom
pokemons.description: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluc­ tuates up and down.

pokemons.name: Jumpluff
pokemons.description: Once it catches the wind, it deft­ ly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.

pokemons.name: Aipom
pokemons.description: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

pokemons.name: Sunkern
pokemons.description: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. if attacked by a spearow, it will violently shake its leaves.

pokemons.name: Sunflora
pokemons.description: It converts sun­ light into energy. in the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.

pokemons.name: Yanma
pokemons.description: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter win­ dows in the area.

pokemons.name: Wooper
pokemons.description: This pokémon lives in cold water. it will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

pokemons.name: Quagsire
pokemons.description: This carefree pokémon has an easy-going nature. while swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

pokemons.name: Espeon
pokemons.description: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its ene­ my's actions.

pokemons.name: Umbreon
pokemons.description: When agitated, this pokémon pro­ tects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

pokemons.name: Murkrow
pokemons.description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

pokemons.name: Slowking
pokemons.description: It has incredible intellect and in­ tuition. whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

pokemons.name: Misdreavus
pokemons.description: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

pokemons.name: Unown
pokemons.description: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tab­ lets. it is said that the two are somehow related.

pokemons.name: Wobbuffet
pokemons.description: It hates light and shock. if attack­ ed, it inflates its body to pump up its counter­ strike.

pokemons.name: Girafarig
pokemons.description: Its tail has a small brain of its own. beware! if you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.

pokemons.name: Pineco
pokemons.description: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. the additional weight doesn't bother it.

pokemons.name: Forretress
pokemons.description: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. what lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

pokemons.name: Dunsparce
pokemons.description: When spotted, this pokémon escapes backward by furi­ ously boring into the ground with its tail.

pokemons.name: Gligar
pokemons.description: It flies straight at its target's face then clamps down on the star­ tled victim to inject poison.

pokemons.name: Steelix
pokemons.description: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

pokemons.name: Snubbull
pokemons.description: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. it is very popular among women.

pokemons.name: Granbull
pokemons.description: It is actually timid and easily spooked. if at­ tacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.

pokemons.name: Qwilfish
pokemons.description: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

pokemons.name: Scizor
pokemons.description: It has a steel-hard body. it intimidates foes by upraising its eye-patterned pincers.

pokemons.name: Shuckle
pokemons.description: The berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

pokemons.name: Heracross
pokemons.description: It is usually docile, but if it is disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.

pokemons.name: Sneasel
pokemons.description: Its paws conceal sharp claws. if attacked, it sud­ denly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

pokemons.name: Teddiursa
pokemons.description: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. it always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.

pokemons.name: Ursaring
pokemons.description: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen berries.

pokemons.name: Slugma
pokemons.description: It never sleeps. it has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.

pokemons.name: Magcargo
pokemons.description: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. it breaks easily with a slight touch.

pokemons.name: Swinub
pokemons.description: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. it sometimes discovers hot springs.

pokemons.name: Piloswine
pokemons.description: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

pokemons.name: Corsola
pokemons.description: It continuously sheds and grows. the tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

pokemons.name: Remoraid
pokemons.description: It has superb ac­ curacy. the water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.

pokemons.name: Octillery
pokemons.description: It traps enemies with its suction- cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

pokemons.name: Delibird
pokemons.description: It carries food all day long. there are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

pokemons.name: Mantine
pokemons.description: As it majestically swims, it doesn't care if remoraid attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.

pokemons.name: Skarmory
pokemons.description: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

pokemons.name: Houndour
pokemons.description: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

pokemons.name: Houndoom
pokemons.description: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

pokemons.name: Kingdra
pokemons.description: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. it can create whirlpools by yawning.

pokemons.name: Phanpy
pokemons.description: It swings its long snout around play­ fully, but because it is so strong, that can be dan­ gerous.

pokemons.name: Donphan
pokemons.description: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. its tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.

pokemons.name: Porygon2
pokemons.description: This upgraded version of porygon is designed for space exploration. it can't fly, though.

pokemons.name: Stantler
pokemons.description: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where real­ ity is distorted.

pokemons.name: Smeargle
pokemons.description: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. it paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

pokemons.name: Tyrogue
pokemons.description: It is always bursting with en­ ergy. to make it­ self stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

pokemons.name: Hitmontop
pokemons.description: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.

pokemons.name: Smoochum
pokemons.description: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. it always uses its lips first to examine things.

pokemons.name: Elekid
pokemons.description: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.

pokemons.name: Magby
pokemons.description: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

pokemons.name: Miltank
pokemons.description: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

pokemons.name: Blissey
pokemons.description: Anyone who takes even one bite of blissey's egg be­ comes unfailingly caring and pleas­ ant to everyone.

pokemons.name: Raikou
pokemons.description: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. they say that it descended with lightning.

pokemons.name: Entei
pokemons.description: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. un­ able to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.

pokemons.name: Suicune
pokemons.description: It races around the world to purify fouled water. it dashes away with the north wind.

pokemons.name: Larvitar
pokemons.description: It feeds on soil. after it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

pokemons.name: Pupitar
pokemons.description: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. its thrashing can topple a mountain.

pokemons.name: Tyranitar
pokemons.description: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

pokemons.name: Lugia
pokemons.description: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

pokemons.name: Ho-oh
pokemons.description: Legends claim this pokémon flies the world's skies con­ tinuously on its magnificent seven- colored wings.

pokemons.name: Celebi
pokemons.description: This pokémon wan­ ders across time. grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

pokemons.name: Treecko
pokemons.description: Treecko has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. this pokémon attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.

pokemons.name: Grovyle
pokemons.description: The leaves growing out of grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. this pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.

pokemons.name: Sceptile
pokemons.description: The leaves growing on sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. this pokémon is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.

pokemons.name: Torchic
pokemons.description: Torchic sticks with its trainer, following behind with unsteady steps. this pokémon breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees f, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.

pokemons.name: Combusken
pokemons.description: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. this pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.

pokemons.name: Blaziken
pokemons.description: In battle, blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. the stronger the foe, the more intensely this pokémon’s wrists burn.

pokemons.name: Mudkip
pokemons.description: The fin on mudkip’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this pokémon can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.

pokemons.name: Marshtomp
pokemons.description: The surface of marshtomp’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. this pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.

pokemons.name: Swampert
pokemons.description: Swampert is very strong. it has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. this pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.

pokemons.name: Poochyena
pokemons.description: At first sight, poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves. this pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. however, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.

pokemons.name: Mightyena
pokemons.description: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. it starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. this pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

pokemons.name: Zigzagoon
pokemons.description: Zigzagoon restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. this pokémon does so because it is very curious. it becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.

pokemons.name: Linoone
pokemons.description: Linoone always runs full speed and only in straight lines. if facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. this pokémon is very challenged by gently curving roads.

pokemons.name: Wurmple
pokemons.description: Using the spikes on its rear end,   wurmple peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. this pokémon’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.

pokemons.name: Silcoon
pokemons.description: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. there,  this pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. it peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.

pokemons.name: Beautifly
pokemons.description: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. if you want to see this pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.

pokemons.name: Cascoon
pokemons.description: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. this pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.

pokemons.name: Dustox
pokemons.description: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. swarms of this pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

pokemons.name: Lotad
pokemons.description: It searches about for clean water. if it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

pokemons.name: Lombre
pokemons.description: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. it sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.

pokemons.name: Ludicolo
pokemons.description: Ludicolo begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. this pokémon is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.

pokemons.name: Seedot
pokemons.description: Seedot attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. it sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. the more water it drinks, the glossier this pokémon’s body becomes.

pokemons.name: Nuzleaf
pokemons.description: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. they occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. this pokémon dislikes having its long nose pinched.

pokemons.name: Shiftry
pokemons.description: It lives quietly in the deep forest. it is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

pokemons.name: Taillow
pokemons.description: Taillow courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. this gutsy pokémon will remain defiant even after a loss. on the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

pokemons.name: Swellow
pokemons.description: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. this pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. the hapless prey is tightly grasped by swellow’s clawed feet, preventing escape.

pokemons.name: Wingull
pokemons.description: Wingull has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. this pokémon rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.

pokemons.name: Pelipper
pokemons.description: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.

pokemons.name: Ralts
pokemons.description: Ralts senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. this pokémon rarely appears before people. but when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.

pokemons.name: Kirlia
pokemons.description: It is said that a kirlia that is exposed to the positive emotions of its trainer grows beautiful. this pokémon controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.

pokemons.name: Gardevoir
pokemons.description: Gardevoir has the ability to read the future. if it senses impending danger to its trainer, this pokémon is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

pokemons.name: Surskit
pokemons.description: From the tips of its feet, surskit secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. this pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.

pokemons.name: Masquerain
pokemons.description: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. this pokémon flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.

pokemons.name: Shroomish
pokemons.description: Shroomish live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. they are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. this pokémon feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

pokemons.name: Breloom
pokemons.description: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. this pokémon’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.

pokemons.name: Slakoth
pokemons.description: Slakoth lolls around for over twenty hours every day. because it moves so little, it does not need much food. this pokémon’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.

pokemons.name: Vigoroth
pokemons.description: Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. it simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. this pokémon’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.

pokemons.name: Slaking
pokemons.description: Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. it eats grass growing within its reach. if it eats all the grass it can reach, this pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.

pokemons.name: Nincada
pokemons.description: Nincada lives underground for many years in complete darkness. this pokémon absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. it stays motionless as it waits for evolution.

pokemons.name: Ninjask
pokemons.description: Ninjask moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. for that reason, this pokémon was long believed to be invisible.

pokemons.name: Shedinja
pokemons.description: Shedinja’s hard body doesn’t move - not even a twitch. in fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. it is believed that this pokémon will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.

pokemons.name: Whismur
pokemons.description: Normally, whismur’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. however, if this pokémon senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

pokemons.name: Loudred
pokemons.description: Loudred’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. it uses its voice to punish its foes. this pokémon’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.

pokemons.name: Exploud
pokemons.description: Exploud triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. if this pokémon violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

pokemons.name: Makuhita
pokemons.description: Makuhita is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. every time it gets back up, this pokémon stores more energy in its body for evolving.

pokemons.name: Hariyama
pokemons.description: It has the habit of challenging others without hesitation to tests of strength. it’s been known to stand on train tracks and stop trains using forearm thrusts.

pokemons.name: Azurill
pokemons.description: A pokémon that lives by water. it moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.

pokemons.name: Nosepass
pokemons.description: Nosepass’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. if two of these pokémon meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.

pokemons.name: Skitty
pokemons.description: Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. this pokémon is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.

pokemons.name: Delcatty
pokemons.description: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. because this pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.

pokemons.name: Sableye
pokemons.description: Sableye lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. they are feared, however, because these pokémon are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.

pokemons.name: Mawile
pokemons.description: Mawhile’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. when the foe least expects it, mawhile chomps it with its gaping jaws.

pokemons.name: Aron
pokemons.description: This pokémon has a body of steel. to make its body, aron feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.

pokemons.name: Lairon
pokemons.description: Lairon tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. this pokémon makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.

pokemons.name: Aggron
pokemons.description: Aggron claims an entire mountain as its own territory. it mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. this pokémon vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.

pokemons.name: Meditite
pokemons.description: Meditite undertakes rigorous mental training deep in the mountains. however, whenever it meditates, this pokémon always loses its concentration and focus. as a result, its training never ends.

pokemons.name: Medicham
pokemons.description: It is said that through meditation, medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. this pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.

pokemons.name: Electrike
pokemons.description: Electrike stores electricity in its long body hair. this pokémon stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. these jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.

pokemons.name: Manectric
pokemons.description: Manectric is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. the sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. when it enters a battle, this pokémon creates thunderclouds.

pokemons.name: Plusle
pokemons.description: Plusle always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this pokémon shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.

pokemons.name: Minun
pokemons.description: Minun is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. it shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.

pokemons.name: Volbeat
pokemons.description: With the arrival of night, volbeat emits light from its tail. it communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. this pokémon is attracted by the sweet aroma of illumise.

pokemons.name: Illumise
pokemons.description: With its sweet aroma, it guides volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.

pokemons.name: Roselia
pokemons.description: Roselia shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. the aroma of this pokémon brings serenity to living things.

pokemons.name: Gulpin
pokemons.description: Virtually all of gulpin’s body is its stomach. as a result, it can swallow something its own size. this pokémon’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.

pokemons.name: Swalot
pokemons.description: When swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. once the prey has weakened, this pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.

pokemons.name: Carvanha
pokemons.description: Carvanha’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. many boats have been attacked and sunk by this pokémon.

pokemons.name: Sharpedo
pokemons.description: Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,” sharpedo is widely feared. its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off. just one of these pokémon can thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.

pokemons.name: Wailmer
pokemons.description: Wailmer’s nostrils are located above its eyes. this playful pokémon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.

pokemons.name: Wailord
pokemons.description: Wailord is the largest of all identified pokémon up to now. this giant pokémon swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.

pokemons.name: Numel
pokemons.description: Numel is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. however, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. this pokémon’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.

pokemons.name: Camerupt
pokemons.description: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. magma of 18,000 degrees f courses through its body. occasionally, the humps on this pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

pokemons.name: Torkoal
pokemons.description: You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke spouting from its shell. tremendous velocity is a sign of good health.

pokemons.name: Spoink
pokemons.description: Spoink bounces around on its tail. the shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. as a result, this pokémon cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.

pokemons.name: Grumpig
pokemons.description: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. when this pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.

pokemons.name: Spinda
pokemons.description: No two spinda have the same pattern of spots. its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.

pokemons.name: Trapinch
pokemons.description: Trapinch’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. this pokémon patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.

pokemons.name: Vibrava
pokemons.description: To make prey faint, vibrava generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. this pokémon’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.

pokemons.name: Flygon
pokemons.description: Flygon is nicknamed “the elemental  spirit of the desert.” because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this pokémon is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.

pokemons.name: Cacnea
pokemons.description: Cacnea lives in arid locations such as deserts. it releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. when prey comes near, this pokémon shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.

pokemons.name: Cacturne
pokemons.description: During the daytime, cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. this pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.

pokemons.name: Swablu
pokemons.description: Swablu has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. this pokémon is not frightened of people. it lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

pokemons.name: Altaria
pokemons.description: Altaria dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. by singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this pokémon makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

pokemons.name: Zangoose
pokemons.description: Memories of battling its arch-rival seviper are etched into every cell of zangoose’s body. this pokémon adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.

pokemons.name: Seviper
pokemons.description: Seviper shares a generations-long feud with zangoose. the scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. this pokémon attacks using its sword- edged tail.

pokemons.name: Lunatone
pokemons.description: Lunatone was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. as a result, some people theorize that this pokémon came from space. however, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.

pokemons.name: Solrock
pokemons.description: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. when it spins, its body shines.

pokemons.name: Barboach
pokemons.description: Barboach’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. this pokémon hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.

pokemons.name: Whiscash
pokemons.description: Whiscash is extremely territorial. just one of these pokémon will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. if a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.

pokemons.name: Corphish
pokemons.description: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. its pincers will never release prey.

pokemons.name: Crawdaunt
pokemons.description: Crawdaunt has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this pokémon, making them desolate places.

pokemons.name: Baltoy
pokemons.description: Baltoy moves while spinning around on its one foot. primitive wall paintings depicting this pokémon living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.

pokemons.name: Claydol
pokemons.description: Claydol are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. this pokémon moves about while levitating.

pokemons.name: Lileep
pokemons.description: Lileep became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. this ancient pokémon attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles  shaped like flower petals.

pokemons.name: Cradily
pokemons.description: Cradily roams around the ocean floor in search of food. this pokémon freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.

pokemons.name: Anorith
pokemons.description: Anorith was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. this primitive pokémon once lived in warm seas. it grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.

pokemons.name: Armaldo
pokemons.description: Armaldo’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. this pokémon’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. they have the power to punch right through a steel slab.

pokemons.name: Feebas
pokemons.description: Feebas’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. because of its shoddy appearance, this pokémon is largely ignored. it is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.

pokemons.name: Milotic
pokemons.description: Its lovely scales are described as rainbow colored. they change color depending on the viewing angle.

pokemons.name: Castform
pokemons.description: Castform’s appearance changes with the weather. this pokémon gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.

pokemons.name: Kecleon
pokemons.description: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. it also changes color if it is happy or sad.

pokemons.name: Shuppet
pokemons.description: Shuppet is attracted by feelings of jealousy and vindictiveness. if someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this pokémon will appear in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves of that person’s home.

pokemons.name: Banette
pokemons.description: Banette generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. this pokémon was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

pokemons.name: Duskull
pokemons.description: Duskull can pass through any wall no matter how thick it may be. once this pokémon chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended victim until the break of dawn.

pokemons.name: Dusclops
pokemons.description: Dusclops’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. it is said that its body is like a black hole. this pokémon will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.

pokemons.name: Tropius
pokemons.description: The bunches of fruit around tropius’s neck are very popular with children. this pokémon loves fruit, and eats it continuously. apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.

pokemons.name: Chimecho
pokemons.description: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. when this pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

pokemons.name: Absol
pokemons.description: Every time absol appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. as a result, it came to be known as the disaster pokémon.

pokemons.name: Wynaut
pokemons.description: Wynaut can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. look at its tail to determine if it is angry. when angered, this pokémon will be slapping the ground with its tail.

pokemons.name: Snorunt
pokemons.description: Snorunt live in regions with heavy snowfall. in seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this pokémon steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.

pokemons.name: Glalie
pokemons.description: Glalie has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. this pokémon has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.

pokemons.name: Spheal
pokemons.description: Spheal is much faster rolling than  walking to get around. when groups of this pokémon eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.

pokemons.name: Sealeo
pokemons.description: Sealeo has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. this pokémon occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a spheal on its nose.

pokemons.name: Walrein
pokemons.description: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. it is protected by its thick blubber.

pokemons.name: Clamperl
pokemons.description: Clamperl’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. a fully grown clamperl’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

pokemons.name: Huntail
pokemons.description: Huntail’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. this pokémon’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.

pokemons.name: Gorebyss
pokemons.description: Gorebyss lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. because of this, this pokémon’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.

pokemons.name: Relicanth
pokemons.description: Relicanth is a pokémon species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. this ancient pokémon feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.

pokemons.name: Luvdisc
pokemons.description: Luvdisc live in shallow seas in the tropics. this heart-shaped pokémon earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.

pokemons.name: Bagon
pokemons.description: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.

pokemons.name: Shelgon
pokemons.description: Inside shelgon’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. this pokémon’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.

pokemons.name: Salamence
pokemons.description: Salamence came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. it is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this pokémon’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

pokemons.name: Beldum
pokemons.description: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout beldum’s body. this pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

pokemons.name: Metang
pokemons.description: When two beldum fuse together, metang is formed. the brains of the beldum are joined by a magnetic nervous system. by linking its brains magnetically, this pokémon generates strong psychokinetic power.

pokemons.name: Metagross
pokemons.description: Metagross has four brains in total. combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. this pokémon can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

pokemons.name: Regirock
pokemons.description: Its entire body is made of rock. if any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.

pokemons.name: Regice
pokemons.description: Regice’s body was made during an ice age. the deep-frozen body can’t be melted, even by fire. this pokémon controls frigid air of minus 328 degrees f.

pokemons.name: Registeel
pokemons.description: Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. its body is apparently hollow. no one has any idea what this pokémon eats.

pokemons.name: Latias
pokemons.description: Latias is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. if it senses any hostility, this pokémon ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

pokemons.name: Latios
pokemons.description: Latios has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. this pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

pokemons.name: Kyogre
pokemons.description: Kyogre has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. this pokémon saved people who were suffering from droughts.

pokemons.name: Groudon
pokemons.description: Groudon has long been described in  mythology as the pokémon that raised lands and expanded continents. this pokémon took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with kyogre.

pokemons.name: Rayquaza
pokemons.description: Rayquaza lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer,  never descending to the ground. this pokémon appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.

pokemons.name: Jirachi
pokemons.description: A legend states that jirachi will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. if this pokémon senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

pokemons.name: Deoxys-normal
pokemons.description: The dna of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in deoxys. the crystalline organ on this pokémon’s chest appears to be its brain.

pokemons.name: Turtwig
pokemons.description: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. it lives along lakes.

pokemons.name: Grotle
pokemons.description: It knows where pure water wells up. it carries fellow pokémon there on its back.

pokemons.name: Torterra
pokemons.description: Small pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

pokemons.name: Chimchar
pokemons.description: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. its fire is put out when it sleeps.

pokemons.name: Monferno
pokemons.description: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

pokemons.name: Infernape
pokemons.description: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. its fire never goes out.

pokemons.name: Piplup
pokemons.description: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. its thick down guards it from cold.

pokemons.name: Prinplup
pokemons.description: It lives alone, away from others. apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

pokemons.name: Empoleon
pokemons.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. the leader has the biggest horns.

pokemons.name: Starly
pokemons.description: They flock in great numbers. though small, they flap their wings with great power.

pokemons.name: Staravia
pokemons.description: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug pokémon. it stays within a huge flock.

pokemons.name: Staraptor
pokemons.description: It has a savage nature. it will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

pokemons.name: Bidoof
pokemons.description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. it is more agile and active than it appears.

pokemons.name: Bibarel
pokemons.description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. it is known as an industrious worker.

pokemons.name: Kricketot
pokemons.description: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

pokemons.name: Kricketune
pokemons.description: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. it can compose melodies ad lib.

pokemons.name: Shinx
pokemons.description: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. it flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

pokemons.name: Luxio
pokemons.description: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. they live in small groups.

pokemons.name: Luxray
pokemons.description: It has eyes that can see through anything. it spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

pokemons.name: Budew
pokemons.description: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. in spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

pokemons.name: Roserade
pokemons.description: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

pokemons.name: Cranidos
pokemons.description: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. its skull is as hard as iron.

pokemons.name: Rampardos
pokemons.description: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

pokemons.name: Shieldon
pokemons.description: A pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. its facial hide is extremely hard.

pokemons.name: Bastiodon
pokemons.description: Any frontal attack is repulsed. it is a docile pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

pokemons.name: Burmy
pokemons.description: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

pokemons.name: Wormadam-plant
pokemons.description: When burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this pokémon’s body. the cloak is never shed.

pokemons.name: Mothim
pokemons.description: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by combee.

pokemons.name: Combee
pokemons.description: A pokémon formed by three others. it busily carries sweet floral honey to vespiquen.

pokemons.name: Vespiquen
pokemons.description: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. it raises its grubs on honey collected by combee.

pokemons.name: Pachirisu
pokemons.description: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. it stores them with berries in tree holes.

pokemons.name: Buizel
pokemons.description: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. it floats on water with its head out.

pokemons.name: Floatzel
pokemons.description: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. it assists in the rescues of drowning people.

pokemons.name: Cherubi
pokemons.description: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

pokemons.name: Cherrim
pokemons.description: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. it tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

pokemons.name: Shellos
pokemons.description: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. in the sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

pokemons.name: Gastrodon
pokemons.description: It has a pliable body without any bones. if any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

pokemons.name: Ambipom
pokemons.description: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. it rarely uses its arms now.

pokemons.name: Drifloon
pokemons.description: A pokémon formed by the spirits of people and pokémon. it loves damp, humid seasons.

pokemons.name: Drifblim
pokemons.description: At dusk, swarms of them are carried aloft on winds. when noticed, they suddenly vanish.

pokemons.name: Buneary
pokemons.description: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. it stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

pokemons.name: Lopunny
pokemons.description: An extremely cautious pokémon. it cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

pokemons.name: Mismagius
pokemons.description: Its cries sound like incantations. those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

pokemons.name: Honchkrow
pokemons.description: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous murkrow in tow.

pokemons.name: Glameow
pokemons.description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. its fickleness is very popular among some.

pokemons.name: Purugly
pokemons.description: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.

pokemons.name: Chingling
pokemons.description: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. it moves with flouncing hops.

pokemons.name: Stunky
pokemons.description: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. the stench lingers for 24 hours.

pokemons.name: Skuntank
pokemons.description: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. its range is over 160 feet.

pokemons.name: Bronzor
pokemons.description: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. it is unknown if they are related.

pokemons.name: Bronzong
pokemons.description: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

pokemons.name: Bonsly
pokemons.description: It looks as if it is always crying. it is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.

pokemons.name: Mime-jr
pokemons.description: It habitually mimics foes. once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this pokémon.

pokemons.name: Happiny
pokemons.description: It loves round white things. it carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of chansey.

pokemons.name: Chatot
pokemons.description: It can learn and speak human words. if they gather, they all learn the same saying.

pokemons.name: Spiritomb
pokemons.description: A pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. it is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

pokemons.name: Gible
pokemons.description: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. it pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

pokemons.name: Gabite
pokemons.description: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

pokemons.name: Garchomp
pokemons.description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. it flies at sonic speed.

pokemons.name: Munchlax
pokemons.description: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

pokemons.name: Riolu
pokemons.description: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

pokemons.name: Lucario
pokemons.description: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. it understands human speech.

pokemons.name: Hippopotas
pokemons.description: It lives in arid places. instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

pokemons.name: Hippowdon
pokemons.description: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

pokemons.name: Skorupi
pokemons.description: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. it tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

pokemons.name: Drapion
pokemons.description: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. the tips of its claws release poison.

pokemons.name: Croagunk
pokemons.description: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. it tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

pokemons.name: Toxicroak
pokemons.description: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

pokemons.name: Carnivine
pokemons.description: It attracts prey with its sweet- smelling saliva, then chomps down. it takes a whole day to eat prey.

pokemons.name: Finneon
pokemons.description: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

pokemons.name: Lumineon
pokemons.description: It lives on the deep-sea floor. it attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

pokemons.name: Mantyke
pokemons.description: A friendly pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

pokemons.name: Snover
pokemons.description: It lives on snowy mountains. having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

pokemons.name: Abomasnow
pokemons.description: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. it is the abominable snowman.

pokemons.name: Weavile
pokemons.description: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

pokemons.name: Magnezone
pokemons.description: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. three units generate magnetism.

pokemons.name: Lickilicky
pokemons.description: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

pokemons.name: Rhyperior
pokemons.description: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. geodude are shot at rare times.

pokemons.name: Tangrowth
pokemons.description: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

pokemons.name: Electivire
pokemons.description: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.

pokemons.name: Magmortar
pokemons.description: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees f from the ends of its arms. it lives in volcanic craters.

pokemons.name: Togekiss
pokemons.description: It will never appear where there is strife. its sightings have become rare recently.

pokemons.name: Yanmega
pokemons.description: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.

pokemons.name: Leafeon
pokemons.description: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. as a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

pokemons.name: Glaceon
pokemons.description: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

pokemons.name: Gliscor
pokemons.description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. when the chance presents itself, it swoops!

pokemons.name: Mamoswine
pokemons.description: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. the population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

pokemons.name: Porygon-z
pokemons.description: Additional software was installed to make it a better pokémon. it began acting oddly, however.

pokemons.name: Gallade
pokemons.description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

pokemons.name: Probopass
pokemons.description: It freely controls three small units called mini-noses using magnetic force.

pokemons.name: Dusknoir
pokemons.description: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

pokemons.name: Froslass
pokemons.description: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees f. what seems to be its body is actually hollow.

pokemons.name: Rotom
pokemons.description: Its body is composed of plasma. it is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

pokemons.name: Uxie
pokemons.description: Known as “the being of knowledge.” it is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

pokemons.name: Mesprit
pokemons.description: Known as “the being of emotion.” it taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

pokemons.name: Azelf
pokemons.description: Known as “the being of willpower.” it sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

pokemons.name: Dialga
pokemons.description: It has the power to control time. it appears in sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

pokemons.name: Palkia
pokemons.description: It has the ability to distort space. it is described as a deity in sinnoh-region mythology.

pokemons.name: Heatran
pokemons.description: It dwells in volcanic caves. it digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

pokemons.name: Regigigas
pokemons.description: There is an enduring legend that states this pokémon towed continents with ropes.

pokemons.name: Giratina-altered
pokemons.description: A pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. it appears in an ancient cemetery.

pokemons.name: Cresselia
pokemons.description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. it is said to represent the crescent moon.

pokemons.name: Phione
pokemons.description: It drifts in warm seas. it always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

pokemons.name: Manaphy
pokemons.description: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.

pokemons.name: Darkrai
pokemons.description: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. it is active during nights of the new moon.

pokemons.name: Shaymin-land
pokemons.description: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.

pokemons.name: Arceus
