pokemons.description: This pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. it protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

pokemons.name: Veluza
pokemons.description: When veluza discards unnecessary flesh, its mind becomes honed and its psychic power increases. the spare flesh has a mild but delicious flavor.

pokemons.name: Dondozo
pokemons.description: This pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting food. it teams up with a tatsugiri to catch prey.

pokemons.name: Tatsugiri
pokemons.description: This is a small dragon pokémon. it lives inside the mouth of dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

pokemons.name: Annihilape
pokemons.description: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

pokemons.name: Clodsire
pokemons.description: When attacked, this pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. it’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

pokemons.name: Farigiraf
pokemons.description: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this pokémon is 10 times stronger than girafarig’s.

pokemons.name: Dudunsparce
pokemons.description: This pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. the nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

pokemons.name: Kingambit
pokemons.description: Only a bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into kingambit.

pokemons.name: Great-tusk
pokemons.description: Sightings of this pokémon have occurred in recent years. the name great tusk was taken from a creature listed in a certain book.

pokemons.name: Scream-tail
pokemons.description: There has been only one reported sighting of this pokémon. it resembles a mysterious creature depicted in an old expedition journal.

pokemons.name: Brute-bonnet
pokemons.description: It is possible that the creature listed as brute bonnet in a certain book could actually be this pokémon.

pokemons.name: Flutter-mane
pokemons.description: This pokémon has characteristics similar to those of flutter mane, a creature mentioned in a certain book.

pokemons.name: Slither-wing
pokemons.description: This mysterious pokémon has some similarities to a creature that an old book introduced as slither wing.

pokemons.name: Sandy-shocks
pokemons.description: No records exist of this pokémon being caught. data is lacking, but the pokémon’s traits match up with a creature shown in an expedition journal.

pokemons.name: Iron-treads
pokemons.description: This pokémon closely resembles a scientific weapon that a paranormal magazine claimed was sent to this planet by aliens.

pokemons.name: Iron-bundle
pokemons.description: Its shape is similar to a robot featured in a paranormal magazine article. the robot was said to have been created by an ancient civilization.

pokemons.name: Iron-hands
pokemons.description: It is very similar to a cyborg covered exclusively by a paranormal magazine. the cyborg was said to be the modified form of a certain athlete.

pokemons.name: Iron-jugulis
pokemons.description: It resembles a certain pokémon introduced in a paranormal magazine, described as the offspring of a hydreigon that fell in love with a robot.

pokemons.name: Iron-moth
pokemons.description: This pokémon resembles an unknown object described in a paranormal magazine as a ufo sent to observe humanity.

pokemons.name: Iron-thorns
pokemons.description: It has some similarities to a pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a tyranitar from one billion years into the future.

pokemons.name: Frigibax
pokemons.description: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. the higher the temperature, the more energy frigibax stores.

pokemons.name: Arctibax
pokemons.description: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

pokemons.name: Baxcalibur
pokemons.description: This pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. this air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.

pokemons.name: Gimmighoul
pokemons.description: This pokémon was born inside a treasure chest about 1,500 years ago. it sucks the life-force out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

pokemons.name: Gholdengo
pokemons.description: Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins. this pokémon gets along well with others and is quick to make friends with anybody.
